ja377:5.3: disatā → disā tāta (sya1ed, sya2ed) | disā tā (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja377:7.2: Dummakkharūpā → dumukkharūpā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | dummukkharūpā (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
ja377:8.2: Bahussuto ce na → bahussuto neva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja377:10.4: Santiṃ puṇeti → santaṃ puno'ti (bj) | santiṃ puneti (pts-vp-pli1ed)
